source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a long, tiled room or hallway partially filled with murky water. The walls are covered in small, light-green tiles, and the ceiling features a series of square lights. At the far end of the space, a doorway is visible at the top of a short flight of stairs.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot of a long, tiled room or hallway partially filled with murky water. The walls are covered in small, light-green tiles, and the ceiling features a series of square lights. At the far end of the space, a doorway is visible at the top of a short flight of stairs.

bad_caption: A group of children rides bicycles down a wide, sunlit corridor lined with wooden panels. As they approach the center of the hallway, one child stops to tie their shoe while the others continue pedaling toward a set of large windows at the far end.
